docs.text:
TraitSimulation.jl (prototype)


A Julia module to perform trait simulation.




Installation


To install TraitSimulation please type the following code in a Julia REPL:


Pkg.clone(
https://github.com/huwenboshi/TraitSimulation.jl.git
)







Key Features




Simulate trait under GLM and GLMM


Provide convenient ways to specify the simulation model






Contact


Huwenbo Shi
 (shihuwenbo [at] ucla [dot] edu)

docs.text:
Getting Started


This section provides some examples on how to use the TraitSimulation module.




Create a random test data set


The following code snippet creates a data frame containing genotype (X1, 
, X5) and phenotype (HDL and LDL) measurements for 10 individuals.


using
 
DataFrames
,
 
Distributions
,
 
TraitSimulation


npeople
,
 
nsnp
 
=
 
(
10
,
 
5
)


snp_data
 
=
 
Matrix
{
Float64
}(
npeople
,
 
nsnp
)


freqs
 
=
 
[
0.2
,
 
0.3
,
 
0.4
,
 
0.7
,
 
0.5
]


for
 
i
=
1
:
nsnp

    
snp_data
[:,
i
]
 
=
 
rand
(
Binomial
(
2
,
freqs
[
i
]),
 
npeople
)


end


hdl_data
,
 
ldl_data
 
=
 
(
Vector
{
Float64
}(
npeople
),
 
Vector
{
Float64
}(
npeople
))


for
 
i
=
1
:
npeople

    
hdl_data
[
i
]
 
=
 
rand
(
Uniform
(
20
,
80
))

    
ldl_data
[
i
]
 
=
 
rand
(
Uniform
(
20
,
80
))


end


data
 
=
 
[
snp_data
 
hdl_data
 
ldl_data
]


data_frame
 
=
 
convert
(
DataFrame
,
 
data
)


names!
(
data_frame
,
 
[:
X1
,
 
:
X2
,
 
:
X3
,
 
:
X4
,
 
:
X5
,
 
:
HDL
,
 
:
LDL
])

docs.text: This section provides some examples on how to use the TraitSimulation module.
docs.title: Getting Started

docs.text:
The following code snippet creates a data frame containing genotype (X1,  , X5) and phenotype (HDL and LDL) measurements for 10 individuals.  using   DataFrames ,   Distributions ,   TraitSimulation  npeople ,   nsnp   =   ( 10 ,   5 )  snp_data   =   Matrix { Float64 }( npeople ,   nsnp )  freqs   =   [ 0.2 ,   0.3 ,   0.4 ,   0.7 ,   0.5 ]  for   i = 1 : nsnp 
     snp_data [:, i ]   =   rand ( Binomial ( 2 , freqs [ i ]),   npeople )  end  hdl_data ,   ldl_data   =   ( Vector { Float64 }( npeople ),   Vector { Float64 }( npeople ))  for   i = 1 : npeople 
     hdl_data [ i ]   =   rand ( Uniform ( 20 , 80 )) 
     ldl_data [ i ]   =   rand ( Uniform ( 20 , 80 ))  end  data   =   [ snp_data   hdl_data   ldl_data ]  data_frame   =   convert ( DataFrame ,   data )  names! ( data_frame ,   [: X1 ,   : X2 ,   : X3 ,   : X4 ,   : X5 ,   : HDL ,   : LDL ])
